posts.post_title: Wts: 1912 t202 birmingham/turner psa 7!! CARD NO LONGER AVAILABLE, THANKS
posts.post_content: Blazer, card looks more like an 8 than a 7. Never have understood why psa is so critical in grading this series of cards. Smr price for a psa 7 is $1700, i will take nearly half price for the first buyer, $995!!  PRICE NOW REDUCED TO ONLY $675!!THANKS, now only $550!! that is 33% of smr price!!!  CARD NO LONGER AVAILABLE. THANKS
Bump. Price reduction to $775. This card is an absoulte blazer! Thanks
Bump. First $675 gets it! That is 35% of what smr price is for a psa 7!! Need xmas $$
Bump. Smr price for a psa 7 is $1700, final reduction price of only $595! First emailer gets it. Thanks
bump. FINAL, $550, WHICH IS 33% OF PSA SMR PRICE!! FIRST EMAILER GETS IT. THANKS

please send me front and back scans; thanks,
jim
